title: Cell Culture Assay with Drugs, Growth Media and Stimulation Media
author: Opentrons
description:
With this protocol, your robot will transfer diluted drugs to cell culture in a 96-well plate.

You will need:
 P50 Single-channel Pipette
 P300 Multi-channel Pipette
 96-deep Well Plate
 96-well U-bottom Plate
 12-well Trough
 200 uL Tip Racks
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will transfer 900 uL growth media to column 1-10 of the Drug Dilution Plate in slot 4.
Robot will transfer and mix 50 uL Drug A in well A11 to well A10.
Robot will transfer and mix 50 uL Drug B in well A12 to well A10.
Robot will serially dilute from well A10 to A2 with 100 uL.
Robot will repeat step 7-9 for row B and C.
Robot will mix and transfer 33 uL cells to column 2-11 of the Assay Plate in slot 1.
Robot will transfer 33 uL diluted drugs from column 1-10 of the Drug Dilution Plate to column 2-11 of the Assay Plate.
Robot will pause for user to transfer the plate to an incubator.
Robot will transfer 33 uL stimulation media to column 2-11 of the Assay Plate.
notes:
Trough Setup:
 Cells: A1
 Growth Media: A2
* Stimulation Media: A3

Drug Setup:
 Drug A: wells A11, B11, C11
 Drug B: wells A12, B12, C12

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Cell Culture Assay with Drugs, Growth Media and Stimulation Media
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
With this protocol, your robot will transfer diluted drugs to cell culture in a 96-well plate.

---

You will need:
* P50 Single-channel Pipette
* P300 Multi-channel Pipette
* 96-deep Well Plate
* [96-well U-bottom Plate](https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/falcon-tissue-culture-plates-96-well-non-treated-u-bottom-growth-area-0-36cm2-well-volume-0-32ml-1-tray/0877254)
* 12-well Trough
* 200 uL Tip Racks
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
6. Robot will transfer 900 uL growth media to column 1-10 of the Drug Dilution Plate in slot 4.
7. Robot will transfer and mix 50 uL Drug A in well A11 to well A10.
8. Robot will transfer and mix 50 uL Drug B in well A12 to well A10.
9. Robot will serially dilute from well A10 to A2 with 100 uL.
10. Robot will repeat step 7-9 for row B and C.
11. Robot will mix and transfer 33 uL cells to column 2-11 of the Assay Plate in slot 1.
12. Robot will transfer 33 uL diluted drugs from column 1-10 of the Drug Dilution Plate to column 2-11 of the Assay Plate.
13. Robot will pause for user to transfer the plate to an incubator.
14. Robot will transfer 33 uL stimulation media to column 2-11 of the Assay Plate.
markdown.notes:
Trough Setup:
* Cells: A1
* Growth Media: A2
* Stimulation Media: A3

---

Drug Setup:
* Drug A: wells A11, B11, C11
* Drug B: wells A12, B12, C12

---

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
